group.name: Gameplay
group.str: If checked, notes will go from up to down instead of down to up, as if they're falling.
If checked, your notes will be centered, making the notes easier to read (for mobile users at least).
If unchecked, hitting any strum that has no note on it will cause a fake miss, it will only deplete your health and lower your score, but won't affect your rating.
Changes the offset that songs should start with.
If unchecked, blood, gore and strong language will be toned down.
If checked, the camera will zoom on each beat.
If checked, will show a bar that tracks the current song position, as well as its percentage from completion.
Give the strumline a semi-(or fully)-transparent background.

group.name: Graphics and Visuals
group.str: If unchecked, the game will use the orginal red and green health bar from the Base Game (also known as V-Slice).
If checked, songs that use shaders that have more impact on the framerate will be loaded. Leave unchecked for a smoother experience.
If unchecked, will make flashes less "flashy". Leave unchecked if you're sentitive to these.
If checked, will reduce the amount of detail each part of the mod has to reduce memory usage.
If checked, will store loaded bitmaps (or more known as sprites) in the GPU, heavily reducing memory usage.
If checked, going to another window will freeze the game until you come back.
If checked, opening the notification bar will freeze the game until you come back.

group.name: Miscellaneous
group.str: If checked, you will be able to access developer features like certain keybinds, editors, developer options, state reloads, console and more.
